backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister defining an empty actor.
feature_evidence.json: A feature evidence report JSON with an empty features list.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists short descriptions of key frontend files including components, styles, Tailwind config, and meme asset.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base file defining OKLCH theme variables for light and dark mode with global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provider and hook managing Internet Identity login state, stored identities, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-driven pink-themed global styles with OKLCH variables and fade-in animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry point that sets up query client, identity provider, and renders App.
frontend/src/ValentineApp.tsx: Interactive Valentine page with a dodging No button and a meme reveal after Yes is clicked.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, radius, animations, and fonts using OKLCH theme variables.
project_state.json: Defines the projectâ€™s Valentine-themed interactive web page state, including existing features, pending requests, and styling/behavior requirements. Contains configuration, feature metadata, and notes for a single-page HTML/CSS/JS implementation.
